title: Lily Allen takes break from Twitter after vile trolls blame her for suffering stillbirth
text:
Lily Allen takes break from Twitter after vile trolls blame her for suffering stillbirth The Smile singer lost her son at six months in 2010 Share Get daily   Thank you for subscribing!   
Lily Allen ’s Twitter account has been taken over by a friend after disgusting Twitter trolls blamed her for suffering a stillbirth . 
The mother of two’s baby son was stillborn at six months in 2010. 
And vile Twitter users were trolling her over it today. 
She wrote: “When I lay in a hospital bed with my deceased son stuck between my legs halfway out of my body for 10 hours.” 
One user replied: “Not to be a d**k but I very highly doubt it was 10 hours.” Lily Allen has responded to vile Twitter trolls (Photo: BBC/PA) They blamed her for suffering a stillbirth 
Lily hit back: “You are a d**k. And it was. I was there, you weren’t.” 
Another cruel troll tweeted the Smile singer: “Maybe if you didn’t pump your body full of drugs you wouldn’t have miscarried.” 
Lily, fuelled with anger, tweeted: “I didn’t miscarry, I went into early labour and by son died from his chord wrapped round his neck.” 
The most disgusting tweet came at this time from a despicable troll, who wrote: “The baby knew you were going to be such a horrible mother so it decided to go out on its own term.” Lily has taken a break from Twitter (Photo: Getty) 
Lily chose to ignore the disgusting sentiment, and tweeted: “My timeline is full of the most disgusting, sexist, misogynistic, racist s**t. Really, new levels. I'm no masochist so I'll be back x.” 
Her Twitter account was later taken over by someone called Dennis in her absence. 
He wrote: “Hi , I'm Dennis,I'll be looking after lily's twitter for a while.I can only communicate in gif form,and I'm going on a hate blocking spree.” 
Dennis sent loving GIFs to people like Caitlin Moran, who’d written: “Lily Allen has had some truly horrible s**t thrown at her today by various c***s trolling her about the death of her son.” Like us on Facebook
